languages.text: {n}Ирлиэт качает головой.{/n} "Сказанное предназначалось лишь для тебя, элантах. Лишь тебе я готова доверить переживания и обнажить душевные раны. У нас с тобой сложилась... особая история и особая связь, {name}. До остальных мне нет дела".

{n}Yrliet shakes her head.{/n} "Those words were meant only for you, elantach. You are the only one I can trust with my feelings. Only to you can I bare my mental wounds. We have a... special history and a special bond, {name}. I do not care about the others."
languages.original_text: {n}Ирлиэт качает головой.{/n} "Сказанное предназначалось лишь для тебя, элантах. Лишь тебе я готова доверить переживания и обнажить душевные раны. У нас с тобой сложилась... особая история и особая связь, {name}. До остальных мне нет дела".

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet shakes her head.{/n} "Those words were meant only for you, elantach. I can trust you alone with my feelings and bare my mental wounds. We have a... special history and a special bond together, {name}. I don't care about the others."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}伊莉耶特摇了摇头。{/n}“那些话仅仅是对你一个人说的，外界人。你是我凭直觉唯一可以相信的人，我只会向你袒露心灵的创伤。我们……有着某种奇妙的情谊与联系，{name}，我不在乎其他人怎么想。”
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet shakes her head.{/n} "Those words were meant only for you, elantach. You are the only one I can trust with my feelings. Only to you can I bare my mental wounds. We have a... special history and a special bond, {name}. I do not care about the others."

traits.locale_text: {n}伊莉耶特摇了摇头。{/n}“那些话仅仅是对你一个人说的，外界人。你是我凭直觉唯一可以相信的人，我只会向你袒露心灵的创伤。我们……有着某种奇妙的情谊与联系，{name}，我不在乎其他人怎么想。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliet menea la cabeza.{/n} «Esas palabras eran solo para ti, elantach. Tú eres {mf|el único al|la única a la} que puedo confiar mis sentimientos. Solo a ti puedo desnudar las heridas de mi alma. Compartimos una... historia especial y un vínculo especial, {name}. Los demás no me importan».
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet shakes her head.{/n} "Those words were meant only for you, elantach. You are the only one I can trust with my feelings. Only to you can I bare my mental wounds. We have a... special history and a special bond, {name}. I do not care about the others."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet menea la cabeza.{/n} «Esas palabras eran solo para ti, elantach. Tú eres {mf|el único al|la única a la} que puedo confiar mis sentimientos. Solo a ti puedo desnudar las heridas de mi alma. Compartimos una... historia especial y un vínculo especial, {name}. Los demás no me importan».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliet secoue la tête.{/n} « Ces mots n'étaient destinés qu'à vous, elantach. Vous êtes la seule personne à qui je peux dévoiler mes sentiments et montrer mes cicatrices spirituelles. Nous avons... une histoire qui nous lie, {name}. Les autres n'ont aucune importance à mes yeux. »
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet shakes her head.{/n} "Those words were meant only for you, elantach. You are the only one I can trust with my feelings. Only to you can I bare my mental wounds. We have a... special history and a special bond, {name}. I do not care about the others."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet secoue la tête.{/n} « Ces mots n'étaient destinés qu'à vous, elantach. Vous êtes la seule personne à qui je peux dévoiler mes sentiments et montrer mes cicatrices spirituelles. Nous avons... une histoire qui nous lie, {name}. Les autres n'ont aucune importance à mes yeux. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliet schüttelt den Kopf.{/n} "Diese Worte waren nur für Euch gedacht, Elantach. Nur Euch kann ich meine Gefühle anvertrauen. Nur Euch kann ich meine mentalen Wunden offenbaren. Wir haben ... eine besondere Geschichte und ein besonderes Band, {name}. Die anderen sind für mich ohne Bedeutung."
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet shakes her head.{/n} "Those words were meant only for you, elantach. You are the only one I can trust with my feelings. Only to you can I bare my mental wounds. We have a... special history and a special bond, {name}. I do not care about the others."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet schüttelt den Kopf.{/n} "Diese Worte waren nur für Euch gedacht, Elantach. Nur Euch kann ich meine Gefühle anvertrauen. Nur Euch kann ich meine mentalen Wunden offenbaren. Wir haben ... eine besondere Geschichte und ein besonderes Band, {name}. Die anderen sind für mich ohne Bedeutung."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}ユリエットは首を横に振る。{/n}「あの言葉はエランタ、お前だけに向けたものだ。我の気持ちを託せるのはお前だけ。心の傷をさらけ出せるのはお前だけだ。我らには…特別な過去があり、特別な絆があるだろう、{name}。他者のことなど気にしない」
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet shakes her head.{/n} "Those words were meant only for you, elantach. You are the only one I can trust with my feelings. Only to you can I bare my mental wounds. We have a... special history and a special bond, {name}. I do not care about the others."

traits.locale_text: {n}ユリエットは首を横に振る。{/n}「あの言葉はエランタ、お前だけに向けたものだ。我の気持ちを託せるのはお前だけ。心の傷をさらけ出せるのはお前だけだ。我らには…特別な過去があり、特別な絆があるだろう、{name}。他者のことなど気にしない」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliet başını sallıyor.{/n} "O sözler sana özeldi elantach. Sadece sana güvenip duygularımı paylaşabilirim. Zihinsel yaralarımı sadece sana gösterebilirim. Özel bir geçmişimiz ve özel bir bağımız var {name}. Diğerleri umurumda değil."
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet shakes her head.{/n} "Those words were meant only for you, elantach. You are the only one I can trust with my feelings. Only to you can I bare my mental wounds. We have a... special history and a special bond, {name}. I do not care about the others."

traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
